How to Apply








How to Apply



















UCR strives to accommodate applicants with disabilities. In the event that your disability prevents you from completing the online application process, please contact us so that we can provide options to assist you in completing the application process. Please contact disabilitymanagement@ucr.edu or (951) 827-2561 for assistance.
 
Video Tutorials
These quick video tutorials will help you navigate the UCR JOBS website. There is also an Adobe .pdf version for users that do not have video capabilities. Download your free Adobe Reader
Note: The videos contain no sound.
How to Register
A step by step video on "How to Register on the UCR JOBS website.
Viewing your Application in Progress
A step by step video guide on "How to view your Applications in Progress".
Managing your Documents
A step by step video guide on "Managing Your Documents".
How to complete your Master Application
A step by step video on "How to Complete your Master Application".
How to Apply and Submit your Application
A step by step video guide on "Applying and Submitting your Application".
